item.title: Resources for supporting partners in Dynamics
item.description:
You’re likely already familiar with various online forums, including those hosted by Microsoft and independent ones like Experts Exchange and Egghead Cafe. However, I wanted to remind you about the specific resources available to Dynamics partners. You can find links to these on https://mbs.microsoft.com/partnersource/resources/discussions/. Beyond public forums, there are private ones exclusively for partners and, my favorite, the partner online technical communities managed by Microsoft Dynamics support. These communities offer a valuable way to expand your knowledge base and utilize your support plan without submitting a formal case...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/resources-for-supporting-partners-in-dynamics/
